languages.text: "Сколь бы ни разнился канон, которому мы следуем, здесь он сходится в одно. Пойдем вершить его вместе как сестры".
languages.translation_comment: Argenta: "This place is steeped in corruption, which means that it must be cleansed. With fire. Down to the last crevice."

languages.text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
languages.original_text: "Сколь бы ни разнился канон, которому мы следуем, здесь он сходится в одно. Пойдем вершить его вместе как сестры".

traits.locale_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
"However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
"However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
"However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
"However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

languages.text: "So unterschiedlich die Lehren auch sein mögen, denen wir folgen, hier verschmelzen sie zu einer. Lasst uns ausziehen, und sie gemeinsam erfüllen, als Schwestern."
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

traits.locale_text: "So unterschiedlich die Lehren auch sein mögen, denen wir folgen, hier verschmelzen sie zu einer. Lasst uns ausziehen, und sie gemeinsam erfüllen, als Schwestern."

languages.text: « Si différentes soient nos voies respectives, ici, elles convergent pour ne faire plus qu'un... Faisons-leur honneur comme deux sœurs unies par une seule et même volonté. »
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

traits.locale_text: « Si différentes soient nos voies respectives, ici, elles convergent pour ne faire plus qu'un... Faisons-leur honneur comme deux sœurs unies par une seule et même volonté. »

languages.text: «Por diferentes que sean los cánones que seguimos, convergen en uno. Cumplámoslo como hermanas».
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

traits.locale_text: «Por diferentes que sean los cánones que seguimos, convergen en uno. Cumplámoslo como hermanas».

languages.text: 「私たちがたどる規範がどんなに異なっていても、ここではひとつに収斂される。姉妹として一緒に叶えようではないか」
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちがたどる規範がどんなに異なっていても、ここではひとつに収斂される。姉妹として一緒に叶えようではないか」

languages.text: “哪怕我们的教义再怎么不同，在这里都毫无区别。让我们像姐妹一样，实现祂的教义吧。”
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

traits.locale_text: “哪怕我们的教义再怎么不同，在这里都毫无区别。让我们像姐妹一样，实现祂的教义吧。”

languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."

languages.text: "Uyguladığımız nizamname ne kadar farklı olursa olsun burada bir olur. Rahibeler olarak onu hep birlikte yerine getirelim."
languages.original_text: "However different the canon we follow, here it converges into one — let us go to fulfil it together as sisters."
